title: Hotel brands innovate for discerning taste buds
description: As food and beverage (F&B) sales now make up nearly 50% of operational revenue for some hotels in India, leading brands are adopting innovative F&B formats to enhance guest experiences. Top hotel chains are introducing global brands, Michelin-star chefs, and unique offerings like masala chai ice cream and Modbar coffee on tap.
